content.text:
# 36th Japan Record Awards

The 36th Japan Record Awards were held on December 31, 1994, and were broadcast live on TBS.
Award winners
*Japan Record Award:
**Takeshi Kobayashi (producer), Kazutoshi Sakurai (Songwriter and Composer) & Mr. Children for "Innocent World"
*Best Vocal Performance:
**Miyuki Kawanaka
*Best New Artist:
**Yuki Nishio
*Best Music Video:
**"Rosier" by Luna Sea
**"Kamisama no H≈çseki de Dekita Shima" by Miya & Yami
External links
*[http://www.jacompa.or.jp/ Official Website]
